alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:16PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Daniels and northeastern Valley Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 215 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Peerless, or 22 miles southeast of Opheim, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Peerless, West Fork and Four Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
